channel.title: KLS:SIME on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in KLS:SIME on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Key BMW Dealer in China Expects to ‘Suffer’ Before Rebound
item.description: Sime Darby Bhd., one of the main dealerships in China for BMW AG, expects things to get worse before sales of the German luxury vehicles rebound in the cut-throat Chinese auto market.
